content: I said let me share this here as it is already in our local board, which I used yesterday and my transaction went smoothly and confirmed within 6hrs. We can still enjoy using low fee for our bitcoin transaction despite the mempool congestion that has resulted to high fee for transactions to be confirmed. ViaBTC free accelerator is what you need, this tool is very easy to use and beginners can use it without any  problem. Viabtc is a mining pool, and when you use their tools, they will iclude your transaction in the next block that they will mine.Use this link: https://www.viabtc.com/tools/txaccelerator/StepsAfter you have made your transaction, you should just copy your txid and paste it on the space..after that click on free submission and you will see if it has been successfully added to the next block. All you need to do after that is to relax and wait for few hours for your transaction to be confirmed.Note : For you to use this tool and be successful with it, you must 1. Make sure that you are using a wallet that supports RBF, this will enable adjust the fee to that fee that will be easy for this tool to accelerate your transaction....2. Your transaction limit should be 500 byte or lower.3. Use minimum of 10sat/byte and above for your transaction fee, which should be around 19 sat/vbyte for native segwit.You can check the fee and size of your transaction by pasting your txid on https://www.blockchain.com/explorer.For people using electrum wallet, it is easy to see your transaction fee and adjust it to the stated fee above. Also I used static because it is easy to make the adjustment, and the fee is also very low on static.The only challenge that you can have is pasting your txid and after clicking on the free submission, if it does not respond, when you experience such, you should relax till the next 0'clock (i.e if you submitted your transaction by 1.15pm, you have to wait till 2.00pm on dot, and refresh the page and immediately paste your txid and click on the free submission.Note: ViaBtc can only have accelerate 100 free tansactions in one hour, and the funniest thing is that these 100 transactions will be complete in less than five minutes, this is why you must be vigilante and fast.Remember there are enough scam accelerators in google and be careful on the one you don't know. ViaBTC free accelerator is genuine.Motivated by Charles-TimEdited.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Quote from: dzungmobile on November 21, 2023, 03:35:15 PMWhat if one unconfirmed transaction is submitted to some different Tx accelerators?This is not a problem, nodes will validate the transaction before they add it to their mempool, and if the transaction was submitted to two mining pool accelerators, but has already been mined by one of them, and the block that contains the transaction has been validated by the network and added to the blockchain, then it is already a confirmed transaction that cannot be mined by another pool.Quote from: mk4 on November 21, 2023, 04:00:48 PMIs ViaBTC pretty much the only free "transaction accelerator" service that actually works? When Googling 'Bitcoin transaction accelerator', a good number of websites appear, but with the entirety of the 2017 bull market, ViaBTC is the only one that actually worked in my case.Quite a lot of them are a scam or are transaction rebroadcasters and not accelerators. ViaBTC is the only one that is working as a free transaction accelerator.

comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: Quote from: dzungmobile on November 21, 2023, 03:35:15 PMWhat if one unconfirmed transaction is submitted to some different Tx accelerators?If you have submitted a transaction to multiple accelerators successfully, it will be mined by the one that mines a block faster. Miners have a candidate block which contains the transactions that will be added to the blockchain if they manage to mine a block. If you submit a transaction to ViaBTC accelerator, they add your transaction to their candidate block. Once a block is mined, ViaBTC remove all the confirmed transactions from their mempool and build a new candidate block. If the mined block includes your transaction, it would be removed from ViaBTC mempool and it can't be selected for their candidate block again.
